title: my lol lags
body: Suddenly without i chance any settings my lol begins to lag and it says i have 60 fps and 35 ms. it lags most in acension but how do i solve the problem reinstall or full repair What helps? Pls help me

replies.body: i fixed it by upgrading my grapichs card driver and optimixing it with nvidia

I also frequently have this problem. It registers normally around 100fps and 40ms for me but runs at approximately 30fps and closer to 400ms in bursts throughout the game. Can't prove to my teammates that I'm just lagging because the ping isn't registering properly.

When you say you're lagging with 60fps and 35ms ping, are those the highest numbers you're hitting for FPS and ping? 

If your pc usually runs at that pace, I'd say you're doing pretty good! If you know you should be getting better performance numbers from your rig, I'd suggest reaching out to our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), since they are much more knowledgeable on hardware specs!
